p.span: The '19-'20 school calendar was approved by the school board on December 17, 2018.

strong.a: Click here to view or download the 2019-2020 school calendar.

p.span: The '20-'21 school calendar was approved by the school board on December 16, 2019.

strong.a: Click here to view or download the 2020-2021 school calendar.

div.span: Boswell High School, Chisholm Trail High School, Saginaw High School - May 30 at Dickies Arena
Watson High School - May 29 at Boswell High School
If campuses are unable to keep those dates due to extended closures and social distancing requirements, back-up dates for graduation are planned.

li.span: Boswell High School - July 23 at Dickies Arena
Chisholm Trail High School - July 23 at Dickies Arena
Saginaw High School - July 23 at Dickies Arena
Watson High School - July 20 at Chisholm Trail High School

div.span: Eagle Mountain-Saginaw is fully accredited by the Texas Education Agency. Eagle Mountain-Saginaw ISD is not responsible for the content of sites hosted on outside webservers.
